comment: Prof said she didn't want to grade a lot of papers, so we were put into groups to write a paper on a speech and submit it. We also watched two movies and took two tests (which I guessed on and made A's). That is the entire class; there didn't seem to be a whole lot of purpose to it, and the prof's lack of engagement seems to reflect this.
rating_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS--EXTRA CREDIT--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Wonderful teacher. She loves to give extra credit and cancel class. With all the extra credit given I ended with a grade over 100. She is always interesting to listen to. Not much work required outside of class besides a group paper.
I missed like more than a month of class and still got an A. I think that sums up this teacher and class.
rating_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS--EXTRA CREDIT--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Ms. Dean was an amazing teacher. Her lectures at times could be a little boring, but she always tries to make it fun. You don't really need to show up to class all the time to get an A. Would definitely take again.

Dr. Dean is amazing. She truly loves her work and cared more for discussion and actual discovery of the subject versus busy work. She tells amazing stories and is just pleasant to be around. Easy A and you definitely won't regret it. "The whole nine!"

Professor Dean is one of my favorite professors! She cares about her students succeeding, her lectures are always interesting, and she always lets you know what is on the test, either by review or a study guide. As a bonus, she almost always ends class early. If you need a Comm class, definitely take her!

She has a passion for the science behind human communication. She actively tries to apply the material to real life situations. With this being said, her lecturing abilities heavily rely on this. When she goes off the powerpoint she isn't engaging whatsoever. Additionally, she appreciates class discussion. Class oftentimes lets out early.
Thorough communicator, pretty chill, loves to travel and lets out class early because she hates to waste time. Pretty awesome overall

Great class! Professor Dean is my favorite. She really knows her information and includes a lot of personal experiences in her lectures. Class is easy if you attend because of in class work. Very rarely have homework. One group project, but not everyone has to present. Plus, most of the time we got out of class 20-30 minutes early, which rocks.
